fields.comment: filepath to the sprite(s), supports the $[0-3] syntax
fields.name: sprite_file

fields.comment: sets the offset to the center of the image
fields.name: sprite_centered

fields.comment: rotates the sprite randomly in 90 degree angles
fields.name: sprite_random_rotation

fields.comment: if true, will set this particle to be behind entities (won't emit light)
fields.name: render_back

fields.comment: delay in seconds...
fields.name: delay

fields.comment: lifetime in seconds...
fields.name: lifetime

fields.comment: original color
fields.name: color

fields.comment: how much the color changes in a second
fields.name: color_change

fields.comment: if 1, the sprites will be rendered using additive blending
fields.name: additive

fields.comment: if 1, the sprites will be rendered onto the emissive render target
fields.name: emissive

fields.comment: original velocity
fields.name: velocity

fields.comment: gravity
fields.name: gravity

fields.comment: what percent of the velocity is slowed by *dt
fields.name: velocity_slowdown

fields.comment: original rotation in rads
fields.name: rotation

fields.comment: how much rotation there is in a second
fields.name: angular_velocity

fields.comment: do we rotate the sprite based on the velocity
fields.name: use_velocity_as_rotation

fields.comment: if set, will set the initial rotation based on the velocity component's velocity
fields.name: use_rotation_from_velocity_component

fields.comment: if set, will 'inherit' rotation from the entity
fields.name: use_rotation_from_entity

fields.comment: 0 = doesn't use the velocity from spawning entity at all, 1 = uses all
fields.name: entity_velocity_multiplier

fields.comment: original scale
fields.name: scale

fields.comment: scale velocity per second
fields.name: scale_velocity

fields.comment: Depth of created particles
fields.name: z_index

fields.comment: this is added to the lifetime
fields.name: randomize_lifetime

fields.comment: random offset for pos
fields.name: randomize_position

fields.comment: if set, will randomize position inside the hitbox aabb
fields.name: randomize_position_inside_hitbox

fields.comment: add this randomized velocity inside this o the velocity
fields.name: randomize_velocity

fields.comment: add this randomized vector2 to scale
fields.name: randomize_scale

fields.comment: this is added to the rotation
fields.name: randomize_rotation

fields.comment: this is added to angular_velocity
fields.name: randomize_angular_velocity

fields.comment: this is added to the alpha
fields.name: randomize_alpha

fields.comment: if set, animation speed is multiplied by a random value inside this range
fields.name: randomize_animation_speed_coeff

fields.comment: if set, will make the velocity's rotation always away from center of randomized aabb
fields.name: velocity_always_away_from_center

fields.comment: will add dt*this to randomize_position_aabb every frame
fields.name: expand_randomize_position

fields.comment: if true, will be culled if not near the camera
fields.name: camera_bound

fields.comment: if the distance from camera (edges) is higher than this, this will be culled
fields.name: camera_distance

fields.comment: disable this from emitting...
fields.name: is_emitting

fields.comment: how many particles do we spawn at one time
fields.name: count_min

fields.comment: how many particles do we spawn at one time
fields.name: count_max

fields.comment: how often do we emit particles
fields.name: emission_interval_min_frames

fields.comment: how often do we emit particles
fields.name: emission_interval_max_frames

fields.comment: if set, this entity is loaded to the emission position by the emitter when it emits
fields.name: entity_file
